channel.title: I need serious help with port forwarding my server
channel.description: i need help with port port forwarding my server but plz dont ask me to go on a tutorial just tell me in the simpliest form plz :P

item.title: I need serious help with port forwarding my server
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Staff, please remove this. We are not helping ppl with portforwarding, its against the rules. Its explained on The Soul’s > How to start a server.

Read full topic
item.source: I need serious help with port forwarding my server

item.title: I need serious help with port forwarding my server
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Portforwarding questions are not permitted here.
Go look in the tutorial section or go to PortForward.Com.

Read full topic
item.source: I need serious help with port forwarding my server

item.title: I need serious help with port forwarding my server
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

Utorrent is very unessential and adds to the program list that may lag your server. My recommendation is just learning how to portforward. Go to a computer store and ask someone how to port forward.

Dont forget to port forward your modem

Read full topic
item.source: I need serious help with port forwarding my server

item.title: I need serious help with port forwarding my server
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Portforwarding with UTorrent doesn’t work for anyone. Its stupid and waste time. Better if you portforward with the router.

Read full topic
item.source: I need serious help with port forwarding my server

item.title: I need serious help with port forwarding my server
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:8, topic:262700”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=346914.msg2672045#msg2672045 date=1234873196]

Please be more specific, portfowarding is a huge chunk of making a server, which part are you unsure of?

~Public boolean

it is, and its not.
you can use utorrent which is rather easy, all you have to do is change the port and its online.

portforward with router on the other hand is messy.

uTorrent is stupid. Why sit there and use an un-safe, unnessecary program when portforwarding takes less than a minute of your time.

Also, www.portforward.com. We don’t help with portforwarding questions.
[/quote]

its safe if you scan it.

and portforward is not 1min of your time. if it was 1min then there would be extra tuts on how to do portforward or even people asking how do to do it.[/quote]

The only reason people keep asking is because they are too idiotic to realize how easy opening a port on a router is.

Read full topic
item.source: I need serious help with port forwarding my server
